alert.note: Alert for Benton; Henry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:27PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Benton and Henry Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 727 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Springville, or 7 miles east of Paris, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Paris, Paris Landing State Park, Springville, Routon, Puryear, Big Sandy, Henry, Mansfield, Haigler Ridge, Foundry Hill, Manleyville, Old Springville, Crossland, Buchanan, India, Sunnyside, Van Dyke, Whitlock, Spring Creek and Porter Court. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for west Tennessee.
